website_summaries.verdict: A budget donut pillow to protect the tailbone while sitting for long periods of time.
pros: Circular design effectively distributes the body weight to the ground, relieving pain and pressure from the hind area
Hypoallergenic material is good for people with allergies
cons: Inflated design can start to leak air or fail to inflate altogether after extended use

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Only positive's about my pillow. Thanks so much for the relief!! I have been suffering for 3 years. Wish I had found the pillow before!
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: Improve your product to match is benefit.
customer_reviews.text: Well I had hope that it would last longer the another competitor’s product but I guess I’ll stick to the old tried and true. Made out of rubber and not pretty but three years running is much better than six months.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Turner

customer_reviews.title: Added inexpensive comfort for me . Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult woman with very limited mobility and I find the size perfect. For those reviews saying too small I imagine it depends on just which body region one is wanting to protect. I have a bedside on outer upper thigh region. I slip this under me while laying on side and position the hole over the sore. The air in the cushion raises thigh just enough to keep the sore from having contact and pressure. It took a few minutes to get the air amount just right, for comfort, but I am very pleased. Have been able to decrease pain pills by about half.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS INTENDED
customer_reviews.text: WE DID NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT FOR PAIN RELEIF OR COMFORT, BUT RATHER TO LIFT A CUSHION HIGHER TO FACILITATE EXIT FROM A CHAIR. SO FAR IT WORKS OKAY.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Would've Given It A Perfect 5 Stars EXCEPT.......
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my ex-girlfriend/best friend who was healing up from a kidney procedure where she had to have a stent put in for a week making sitting down extremely uncomfortable and this did the job perfectly as far as what it was intended for. Only reason I subtracted a star was because inflating it wasn't as easy as they made it out to be using the pump that it came with but I figured out how to do it by manually blowing into it.
customer_reviews.author: MitchRider2014

customer_reviews.title: If you are having a baby soon I HIGHLY recommend purchasing one of these
customer_reviews.text: If you are having a baby soon I HIGHLY recommend purchasing one of these. After having a baby, the LAST thing you want to do is sit down, it was quite painful for me. They didn't give me a donut in the hospital until day 2 (apparently it isn't routine to hand these out anymore, which I do not understand). I used this for 2 weeks PP (took it EVERYWHERE with me lol) and it made sitting down a million times more comfortable. Comes with a pouch to put the deflated donut in and also has a nice hand pump to inflate the donut with!
customer_reviews.author: Brett L. Bradstreet

customer_reviews.title: Want hold up long term!
customer_reviews.text: Kept leaking or busting at the seam ordered 3 times, third time went with a different kind not one to pump up and I absolutely love it with my pelvic and back pain This one is the best and I’ve I’ve been buying pillows since my surgery of 2007. Amazon replaced with this one, Lisenwood donut pillow orthopedic Buy this one not dr Fredericks unless you’re gone I guess use it for a month or two maybe temporarily.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: A 99 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my mother-in-law. She tried it for 5 minutes and now it decorates the floor along with her slippers I got her. She is 99 almost 100 and there is no changing her so I don't think it is your product.
customer_reviews.author: barbara wade

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion, lousy inflation valve.
customer_reviews.text: Offers great relief of pressure on coccyx/tailbone *BUT* without modifying the anti-deflate valve, the only way to inflate it is with the bulky 1"x6" air injector supplied, which I hate (because of its size). You just can't pinch that anti-deflate valve out of the way. It's really unnecessary to have the anti-deflate valve in there, since it only takes two breaths to inflate it to the firmness I like. I cut out the valve. This is my 3rd one, they have all been the same in that way. I keep leaving them behind in my hurry to get off an airplane. Advice to manufacturer: leave out the one-way anti-deflate valve, don't include the air injector pump, all would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Mole

customer_reviews.title: Non-Existent Customer Service @ FREDERICK MEDICAL SUPPLY
customer_reviews.text: I found this cushion to be unbearably uncomfortable as it was too hard. I tried deflating it a little at a time to make it softer, but it was still uncomfortable for me. (I am 5'3", weigh117 lbs, and ordered the 15" cushion.) I contacted Frederick Medical Supply with my complaint nearly a month ago and they never even responded. Not even a form email acknowledging they received my inquiry.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after 3 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Too bad I waited a month before inflating this pillow. Within 3 minutes it started deflating from what I'm assuming is a tear. UPDATE: Seller reached out after my review and sent a "one time" replacement pillow which had a slow leak and was completely useless after less than a week. Both defective pillows were red. The blue pillow I first purchased from this company several years ago is still working, although it started deflating more frequently than when new which is why I purchased a second one. I guess it's a toss up whether or not you'll receive a pillow with structural issues.
customer_reviews.author: amfme5

customer_reviews.title: Tougher than I thought
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on different cushions like this popping I was skeptical about any of them holding their air and not popping. I've only had it 2 weeks now and used it about 6 times. It is weird sitting on it in the car. And while it doesn't relieve all the pain, it certainly does relieve a lot of it. I had a bruised tailbone from a horse trying to buck me. It has held the air very well and even survived on bumpy roads. At 190# I'm not terribly small. Just know it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: TorqueThrills

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air at all
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this product. This thing is totally incapable of keeping air in. There is a hole along the inner seam that allows air out. I have tried to make this work and figure out some kind of clamp to fix the problem but nothing has worked. The return window has closed so now I am out $$$ and have nothing but this piece of garbage that is going in the trash. Save your money and find something similar from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Beck

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Lasted four days. Only sat on it for around 8 hours total. I only weigh 160 lbs. Cushion was used on a cushioned chair, not a hard surface. Sprung a leak somewhere along hidden seam. Had high hopes. Was easy to inflate. Not worth sending it back. Will stock with foam.
customer_reviews.author: AlanG

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! However after 2 weeks of use the cushion could not hold air any longer! I did not inflate the product too much and while I was sitting on it I heard air coming out of it. I made sure the tip was tight but it seemed like the issue was with in the inner donut seam that came apart slightly. This product never came in contact with a sharp object to cause this. 14 dollars was a waste of money spent for this product.
customer_reviews.author: H.S

customer_reviews.title: owned two. both leaked air and i'm only 145 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: i've bought two. i rarely used them. i used the first one for a few months and had to tear the cloth off to tape the rubber material and put a towel over it. i had forgotten i ordered another a while ago because these are cheap...used it for about a month and yep...it leaks too. i weigh 145 lbs. cheap cushions don't save you money. they are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold air...deflated in 2 seconds after sitting on it. Tried multiple times to make sure I wasn’t going crazy and yep...I wasn’t going crazy...went flat each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product did no stay inflated.
customer_reviews.text: Product only last a couple months with sporadic use. It did not stay inflated. Not able to find or fix the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Behem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for quality, comfort, ease of use and value
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived promptly, and I am very pleased with the quality. It was easy to fill and is extremely comfortable to use. For the quality, it is extremely well priced. I had selected another product, went back and read some product reviews and switched to purchase this cushion, and I am very happy that I did!!
customer_reviews.author: missTee

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me. It was too small and was hoping for a larger size. It is made good and would be good for a smaller person.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought to use during exercising on recumbent bike. Takes all the pressure off making the exercising pain free. Well constructed and easy to inflate. Can be used just about anywhere. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhawk494

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great seller, family owned business. The outside of the cushion has a slightly fuzzy fabric coating that is sooo much better than a plain old "rubber donut". Less slippery on chair and feels good on the tush! I have learned from prior experience to SLIGHTLY underinflate the ring for optimal comfort but that is personal preference. It is great to have a pump rather than have to blow it up manually.
customer_reviews.author: ginabean of MN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cusion
customer_reviews.text: I love this cushion. It holds air and is very comfortable. I am very thin and cannot sit for more than an hour on any seat. I can't sit in the car for long trips. This cushion has absolutely addressed the issue. I put very little air in it and it provides just enough relief to work perfectly. I like the fact that I can decide how much air it needs for my comfort. So far it has not leaked any air. It was a life saver for me. I have several to use in different places.
customer_reviews.author: kphaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep me from getting a sore seat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep me from getting a sore seat! Every airline or car trip, or long office meeting has been torture! But NO MORE painful tailbone! I'm using it at my computer desk now. This was super easy to inflate, and all I needed was just a little bit. This will be easy to pack on my next airplane trip: I can inflate it on the plane. The big pillow cushions don't work as well and are embarrassing and bulky to carry around in public. I can carry this cushion in my purse. I think I'll order another one to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Nora the Hun

customer_reviews.title: LASTS FOR MANY YEARS.
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT SEVERAL DONUTS FOR MY WIFE, BUT ALL THE OTHERS LEAKED & HAD TO BE RETURNED FOR A REPLACEMENT THAT ALSO LEAKED. THIS UNIT HAS LASTED MANY YEARS FOR MY WIFE, & NOW SINCE SHE PASSED, I USE IT FOR MY COMPUTER CHAIR. THIS IS THE ONLY 1 THAT HAS A NICE MATERIAL ON IT SO IT IS NOT COLD TO SIT ON. GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: GOLDENROD

customer_reviews.title: This thing has saved my tailbone and my sanity!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved my tailbone and my sanity! I had a surgical procedure recently, developed complications and was in the ICU for days and the hospital for a total of 7 days. I could not get comfy to save my life because my tailbone was hurting so much...even with pain meds but I had to stay in bed on my back and was not allowed to lay flat so there was a lot of pressure on my tailbone. I just purchased this the week prior so I had my hubby bring this to the hospital and bingo....relief!! I am still using it as I recover at home and could not be happier. Thank you, Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the cushion from Amazon and it was delivered on time. I've used donut cushions in the past and this one is as good as any I have found. It takes a minute or two to learn the best way to inflate the cushion, but it holds air better than most and is reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lawes

customer_reviews.title: Relief from long hours of sitting
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t inflate it fully, it is very soft. My mom is boneyards and we bought it for her to sit for 4 hours in dialysis and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scelza

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Frederick is full of hot air...
customer_reviews.text: ... but his donut pillow will not hold it. Purchased in November. No longer stays inflated. When you click on Dr. Frederick's guarantee, nothing comes up but a list of products. Scam? Want money back but out of refund period. Typical, isn't it?
customer_reviews.author: robo

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT PURCHASE, SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: March 2020 Update: PLEASE DO NOT PURCHASE, SAVE YOUR MONEY. I actually bought two, and the second one has just recently broke (air is leaking) after a week of consecutive usage... I use this cushion for work, around 8 hours per day, so it's safe to say, after 40 hours of usage this is no longer working. I’m very disappointed with the product, I bought it in March 2019, used it everyday during work (8 hours of work per day), and in May 2019 this is now broken and deflated. The cushion has holes now which caused the air the leak... and I have average weight....
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Will not inflate anymore
customer_reviews.text: Ok, thought this was a pretty good pillow, I have it in my car and since Covid19 have not used it that much because we stay at home. But I do have a medical issue, so I really need it. Well it has been a little over 4 months and now will not inflate, very disappointed. Thought possibly this would be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: diana burns

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to help with post partum recovery and did not find this comfortable at all. Sitting on this felt unbalanced and I felt like I was going to fall. I tried decreasing the air, the cushion was still very hard and uncomfortable. I ended up using a chair cushion instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Good product well made
customer_reviews.text: Good product, well made. Easy to inflate I don't use the pump it came with,just throw it away. It's easy to just blow it up by mouth..not have to keep track of stupid pump. Good item
customer_reviews.author: Starman

customer_reviews.title: It is as it is stated
customer_reviews.text: The inflatable seat cushion is great as you can adjust the firmness.
customer_reviews.author: mjbol

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold air
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time purchasing these donuts. I wanted to have a backup, so I ordered 2. Neither of the donuts held air very long and would go flat quickly. They inflated like normal without appearing to have any leaks, but would lose the air within 12 hours (even when not being sat on). I finally gave up using it when it went flat while sitting on it. I had no issues with the product when I ordered previously so I am very disappointed that I spent money on 2 and both had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Glenn

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been having coccyx pain from my long flights and my chiropractor suggested me to use a donut cushion. I like this product because it's easy to inflate and comfortable. The only thing that bugs my husband when he's around is that this cushion makes creaking noise whenever I move my position, it's probably because of the rubbery material. But overall it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Puri

customer_reviews.title: Beware might spring a leak
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this cushion for 2 1/2 months and it's already losing air. I'm just going to order another one from a different company. It's sad because it works great otherwise. I'm paralyzed from the neck down and have to sit in a wheelchair all day. So needless to say I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Matosky

customer_reviews.title: Good option.
customer_reviews.text: Easy blow and stay firm. Very convenient. Is not too big, for me work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: I have hip arthritis so I thought I would give this a try. My body weight keeps pushing the inflate valve out and the pillow deflates. That defeats the entire purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bed Sores
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow because I figured it could be inflated just a little. I have been sleeping with it for over a week and it is perfect. I am using it while treating bed sores. Very easy to inflate. And it arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: susan allen

customer_reviews.title: Great or sitting comfort!
customer_reviews.text: A great aide for pain relief and sitting on when using a low chair. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Denice Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow. I didn't give it 5 stars because ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow. I didn't give it 5 stars because the pump that came with the pillow didn't work so I had to blow up the pillow myself which was s little annoying. I would've called the company to ask for a new pump but I didn't have time because I received the pillow one day before my surgery and didn't have time to wait to get a new one. I needed to use the pillow immediately after receiving it. But the pillow held its air and shape and I didn't have to add air to it even after using it everyday for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Harraka

customer_reviews.title: Soft and velvety doughnut
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for sitting. This doughnut cushion is great for pain relief. great quality material, holds pressure well over time and has a nice velvet feel cover. I love everything about this cushion except for the fact the cover is not removable. This makes it to adjust for bed use but is excellent for chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Lunawolf

customer_reviews.title: Hard to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Great except very difficult to inflate with the provided pump. Ultimately I had to just blow it up with my own breathe and that pump became a bath toy for my daughter. If an elderly person were to attempt to inflate this themselves they'd find themself stuck. With that said, once I got it inflated it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Brewster Family

customer_reviews.title: Really nice design for mid/big guys. Gradually leaks air over the period of 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Worked nice for me. Suited my body type. I have two of this. If you are not ashamed to use this in public can put it on office chair. Reduces pressure on hemorrhoids. Helps in soothing treatment. Keep using it until the pain in ass is not really gone!!! Nice gripping material help to sit on that. Do not overfill the air. Leaking is gradual and is at acceptable rate.
customer_reviews.author: kaushal Patel

customer_reviews.title: The real donut for back comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I use every day and especially because I can inflate it just what I need for comfort (without the pump) and it can be placed in a jeans pocket when empty.
customer_reviews.author: PEPE1950

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a good waist I really need it because I work for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Min

customer_reviews.title: Work without pain.
customer_reviews.text: Works but you need to adjust the inflation to fit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pillow
customer_reviews.text: The fabric textured surface grips the surface it is placed on and it stays in place. It retains the air pressure that is set by the user for weeks without needing to be repumped. The supplied pump is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Air Fill and Donut Hole Make the Difference
customer_reviews.text: I had prostate surgery three days ago. Before going in, I ordered this donut cushion, and it was waiting when I returned home. Before inflating it, I first tried several molded foam ring donut cushions I had around, but they were painful to sit on. This inflatable cushion made all the difference – I wouldn’t try to sit down without having it under me.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: very good for many hours on a chair
customer_reviews.text: The best product of many cushions I tried before for my work
customer_reviews.author: Hae Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a chance to use it multiple times yet, but it appears to be sturdy. Definitely worth the cost and the included mini air pump is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lee K.

customer_reviews.title: Beware that this product is not long lasting - have air leakage within 10 days of use!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these to use them in various locations (in my car, at work, at home etc). Out of the four I ordered, two of them have become completely useless. Both of them had the problem with leakage of air from the pillow. I was able to return one, but I am not able to return the other as my return window has closed. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 months. It just suddenly have out. I have a coccyx separation so I am totally dependent on the donut. Now I need something that lasts more than 3 months as I work seated for min 8 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Olive R

customer_reviews.title: it rips
customer_reviews.text: It worked good for 1 day. then it leaked disappointed but mainly b/c I needed some relief
customer_reviews.author: David Andrew Levine

customer_reviews.title: Save your ass too.
customer_reviews.text: I used this after some heavy duty ass surgery. It literally saved my ass. No protruding rectum. No bloody knickers.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 91 year old mother. She is 5’ and probably weighs 95 lbs. She needed relief from sitting in a recliner all the time. This was the perfect size and has helped so much. Fully inflated was a little too hard so we just late a little air out and that did it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: complete relief
customer_reviews.text: great for relieving the pain caused by sitting on my tail-bone too long.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: This saved my talebone while in the hospital after having ...
customer_reviews.text: This saved my talebone while in the hospital after having my baby, I wish I would’ve gotten this 3 babies ago. Getting the pump into the value was slightly challenging but it pumped the ring up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: So small I couldn't even sit on it. Very hard and uncomfortable. I am 5' 2" and weigh 140 lbs. This thing should be described as child size.
customer_reviews.author: Gma75

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: While recovering from a fall, my mother has to spend a lot of time sitting. As you can guess, her tailbone began to bother her (not a lot of meat on her bones!) and it was painful to sit. Dr. Frederick's donut has been an invaluable aid for her. It is high quality and made by a company that really cares about it's customers.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a little over a week and it began to rapidly deflate after being fully inflated, clearly defective. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gasquet

customer_reviews.title: A must for new moms!
customer_reviews.text: A must if you are about to give birth. Thank goodness I had this on the way home from being discharged from the hospital after labor/delivery. I used this in the car for about a month and it was an absolute necessity! It made it a better car ride and saved me from road bumps, pot holes and rough roads!
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like the fabric feel and stayed put under you. Inflation with pump is a little awkward but once there is air in it inflation gets easier. I leave it with only a little air in it for stability.
customer_reviews.author: JimP

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for about two months and it already broke. There is a hole (can’t find it visually but can hear the air escaping) and will not inflate. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dudek

customer_reviews.title: ... inch cushion is too small for me can I recommend the 18 inch
customer_reviews.text: The 15 inch cushion is too small for me can I recommend the 18 inch. The outer part has a nice cloth. However the inner tube is standard vinyl plastic. Several of mine were sealed, probably because of the heat. The state could not be inflated. The company was wonderful about replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring mind KJ

customer_reviews.title: the doctor recommended using this kind of pillow
customer_reviews.text: I hurt my coccyx in a random fall & couldn't sit at all..the doctor recommended using this kind of pillow. This is awesome for the price and helped me tremendously. I am 90% back to normal & I feel this helped in the healing process as I wasn't applying pressure to my back while sitting.
customer_reviews.author: SSKH

customer_reviews.title: The cushion is nice but a little small for me
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is nice but a little small for me. I also have the 18" and that size is a little bit better. The only negative I can think of is the little pump.. It's very cheap but does the job. Mine came broken but since I ordered two cushions, I have another pump to use.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: comfort and convenience
customer_reviews.text: Pump helps to inflate the cushion wonderfully. Nice to have it included. Soft cover makes sitting/laying on the cushion more comfortable and not so hot.
customer_reviews.author: BVasst

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice to give it another try, gets holes inside seam within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: It was good to sit and pain was getting relieved, within two weeks it started to lose air. Noticed that its coming out from inside seam. Wanted to give it another try since pain was getting relieved, second one started loosing air too. Not a good tube.
customer_reviews.author: G@@n@

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: It inflated easily and stay inflated until air manually released. Helped a lot to relieve pressure after surgery. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described. Attended a friends wedding two ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Attended a friends wedding two weeks postpartum and was still very sore but had no issues sitting in the hard pews during the hour long service with this cushion, just wish I had gotten this right after baby was born instead of waiting for a week.
customer_reviews.author: MomofMultiples

customer_reviews.title: Colorectal doctor does not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Colorectal doctor says these are actually bad for people and can can hemorrhoids and that you’re better off using a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my dad that has rectal cancer, also helps him with the pain when sitting down.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. Love the inflation too. However, this cushion didn't work for me. Hole was too small to allow for relief of pressure on my tailbone. That may have been because of my injury. If you need a small cushion this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't quite what I thought it would be. My last pregnancy, my chiropractor had some donut pillows that were big enough to accommodate my growing abdomen while she worked on my back, and I thought this would be something like that, but it is way too small for that. I was also looking for something to sit on post-partum, and I think this will definitely do the trick. I sat on it and it doesn't come into contact with the area that was sore from tearing last time.
customer_reviews.author: Happy wife

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product - kept deflating due to leak after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: John L Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Serves the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Item well made and good value for the price. Serves the purpose(s) as described. Inflation process a little bit tricky at first. Instruction to "pull out the valve" rather confusing. Experiment with different pressure amounts to find that most comfortable for a given situation.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Fractured tailbone help.
customer_reviews.text: I fractured my tailbone a while back. It's one of those things that you have to endure. Like a broken rib or a fractured skull. This cushion was recommended by my Doctor and the nurse. Turns out she had used one too. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, my mom needed a cushion that was ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, my mom needed a cushion that was durable because of chronic pain while sitting after a fall a few months ago, where she fractured her pelvis. She says her pain is virtually gone since using this cushion.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blue

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the cheaper ones, it leaks after a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: W.R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Waste  of Money
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Always lost air and wouldn t hold air entirely after 6 weeks. Don t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: mary r

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a several hours long car ride. It held air for about 3 minutes. Don't waste your money on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: neurotome

customer_reviews.title: Inflates easily, the included hand pump is a big plus
customer_reviews.text: Inflates easily, the included hand pump is a big plus. These donuts are certainly useful in many situations though it's not easy to comfortably position yourself on the donut on some chairs -- not a detractor of the product, just a reminder. The donut seems durable and has a soft outer covering.
customer_reviews.author: squidvicious

customer_reviews.title: too small for adults
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work, does no relive pain and is uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rose Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Still the best donut for bottom trouble.
customer_reviews.text: Still the best for bottom trouble. It's firmer than foam, so if you have a little extra cushion yourself, you won't lose the benefit of the opening in the center. I keep mine slightly more than half-filled, so I get some 'softness' and relief.
customer_reviews.author: T. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend who needed the donut due to his discomfort from a cyst. He was so pleasantly surprised to get it and had no problems inflating it immediately. He was thrilled to get some pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: dsb

customer_reviews.title: Was great, but didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Was fine, but sprung a leak at the seams after a month or so. No easy way to fix since it’s under fabric, so have to throw it out. It did its job the time it lasted, but the durability issue is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: been using it for a few years and everyday.
customer_reviews.text: been using it for a few years and everyday. Only put air in it the first initial day to fill it up
customer_reviews.author: Mugsy

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: I think it is junk! After using it for a week it deflates. I would never buy this again 👎
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good product good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for elderly parent. Compact. Easy to inflate. Does the job well. Grandma has to fight with three year old for use. Cheap enough to buy one for him too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not last 1 month thought it would be better
customer_reviews.author: man of peace

customer_reviews.title: Good for about a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about a month. Then went flat. Won’t re-inflate. Must be a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Fox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Due to a health condition I purchased this item. Came very quickly and was very easy to inflate. It has made my life easier
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Raye

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke after 2 day’s use
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pillow. I used it after I had my baby, but it broke on the 2nd day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Petula Lee Assang

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend someone to buy it. Mine got a whole in the first day after sitting on it for less than 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gets leaked within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Dear All, I bought this on Jan 29, 2019 and it got leaked at the end of April 2019, it did not even last me for 3 months. The worst part is there is no way to return this item as there is no return button available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT do the job for me; was not what I expected but was well made
customer_reviews.author: Stone_Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Way too small for my bum!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to ease the discomfort of radiation to my pelvic and buttocks area but really was too small and the wrong shap.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very poor quality. Used it for less than a month and it starts leaking. Would like to request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dr. Frederick's Original Donut Pillow - 15" Inflatable Donut Cushion for Tailbone Pain Relief - Hemorrhoid Treatment - Bed Sores - Prostatitis - Red
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR CUSHIONING: The ring shape distributes body weight evenly without putting pressure on the perineum to help relieve pelvic, perineal, and anal pain. This allows for effective pain relief and healing of the affected area.
COMFORT & DURABILITY: Soft & durable material conforms to your body for superior cushioning while resisting punctures and leaks. Holds weight up to 330 lbs.

CLEAN & HYGIENIC: The synthetic flannel cover is hypoallergenic and machine washable providing you with a safe and clean cushion. As an added bonus, our cushion is made latex free. Rest assured your backside will be better off than it is now.
ODOR FREE: No toxic rubber smell like our competitors products. We hear customer complaints about the toxic smell of other inflatable cushions. We give your nose a break with our odorless material.

EASY INFLATION: Fast and easy inflation by mouth or with the included air pump. Other cushions are difficult to inflate and can leave you feeling short of breath. With our included air pump, you will always be able to inflate your cushion quickly and easily.
